author: Retro Game Corps
description:
Here is an updated video guide on how to install Batocera on any PC, transforming it into a retro gaming emulation console that's perfect for your living room setup.

Written guide: https://retrogamecorps.com/2023/05/26/transform-any-pc-into-a-retro-gaming-console-batocera-guide/

Recommended PCs:
GMKtec G10: https://tidd.ly/49jq3fV
Also on Amazon: https://amzn.to/3LEaQfK
Mid-range mini PC: https://amzn.to/3LErP1q
High-end mini PC: https://amzn.to/47WY1Vf

Recommended tools:
Keyboard with trackpad: https://amzn.to/48eV6bE
512GB SSD: https://amzn.to/4nVhlrG
SSD heatsink: https://amzn.to/3K43odd
8BitDo Ultimate 2: https://youtu.be/gGZQIhJeCuE
8BitDo Pro 3: https://youtu.be/oqycWSEper0
Flash drive: https://amzn.to/4pbZ0b4

Software:
Batocera: https://batocera.org/
Raspberry Pi Imager: https://www.raspberrypi.com/software/
Retro Achievements: https://retroachievements.org/
Screenscraper: https://screenscraper.fr/

This was a review unit sent to me by the manufacturer.  All opinions are my
title: How to Make a $200 Retro Gaming Console
